name: Goofy Groceries
description: A group of friends has been travelling through Ireland for several days now. They've had a blast so far. Days were spent sightseeing or enjoying nature. Nights were filled with drinking, games and bars. No one has seen actual vegetables in a while, because dinner has consisted of burgers, fries and pizza. Tonight the group has decided to eat healthy for a change, part of the group is sent to the supermarket to do groceries. You are burdened with this great responsibility, good luck!

parking-lot-init.name: Parking Lot
parking-lot-init.description: You arrived at the parking lot of the Goofy Groceries market, time to get food!
parking-lot-init.hint: This is the starting point of this story. Check the home tab for more information and background. Have fun!

parking-lot.name: Parking Lot
parking-lot.description: This is the parking lot of Goofy Groceries, a great supermarket!
parking-lot.hint: This is the starting area of this story. Check the home tab for more information and background. Have fun!

entrance.name: Entrance
entrance.description: You are at the entrance of goofy groceries

main-aisle-1.name: Main Aisle 1
main-aisle-1.description: A big aisle connecting to a lot of different aisles. A sign hanging from the ceiling reads: 'Now: All products, 1 coin'

main-aisle-2.name: Main Aisle 2
main-aisle-2.description: A big aisle connecting to a lot of different aisles. A sign hanging from the ceiling reads: 'Now: All products, 1 coin'

main-aisle-3.name: Main Aisle 3
main-aisle-3.description: A big aisle connecting to a lot of different aisles. A sign hanging from the ceiling reads: 'Now: All products, 1 coin'

main-aisle-4.name: name
main-aisle-4.description: A big aisle connecting to a lot of different aisles. A sign hanging from the ceiling reads: 'Now: All products, 1 coin'

register.name: Register
register.description: A sign at the register reads: 'Now: All products, 1 coin'

shopping-basket.name: Shopping Cart
shopping-basket.description: This fancy shopping cart is pink with pretty ribbons. It contains the products you are currently holding. When bringing it along you can inspect it's contents throughout the store, neat!

purse-1.name: Purse
purse-1.description: You found this purse on the ground, it has always been empty. At least, that's what you'll say when anyone asks!

RECIPE-skip-entrance-recipe-stand.name: Made-up recipe
RECIPE-skip-entrance-recipe-stand.description: You came up with this recipe, to avoid having to look at the recipe stand. The ingredients are: Cheese, Spinach, Pasta, Bacon and Herb cheese

RECIPE-entrance-recipe-stand-nachos.name: Nacho recipe
RECIPE-entrance-recipe-stand-nachos.description: You took this recipe from the recipe stand. The ingredients are: Nachos, Cheese, Crème fraîche, Guacamole, Bell pepper, Tomatoes and Minced meat

RECIPE-entrance-recipe-stand-wraps.name: Wraps recipe
RECIPE-entrance-recipe-stand-wraps.description: You took this recipe from the recipe stand. The ingredients are: Wraps, Chicken, Cheese, Bell pepper, Lettuce, Crème fraîche and Corn

friend-start-phonecall.name: Patrick
friend-start-phonecall.description: You are being called by your friend, Patrick

options.response: Hey, nice to see you have your phone on for a change! We just realized that we have no clue how to make anything. Make sure to pick up some recipes at Goofy's!
No, just hurry, we're getting hungry!

entrance-recipe-stand.name: Recipe Stand
entrance-recipe-stand.description: This is a small stand with some recipes of the week.

options.response: You inspect the recipes in the stand, a few interesting recipes catch your eye

options.text: You hate stands, to avoid having to look at it, you quickly think of a recipe yourself
options.response: The stand is a bit insulted
You take the recipe for nachos from the stand.
You take the recipe for wraps from the stand.

register-1.name: Register
register-1.description: Here you can pay for your products, with coins. After an item is bought, it is added to your inventory.

inspect-products-on-hand.name: Shopping basket
inspect-products-on-hand.description: These are the products you are currently carrying along.

options.response: Wow, what a pretty bell pepper!

bottle-machine.name: Empty bottle machine
bottle-machine.description: Empty bottles can be handed in here for coins. Hmmm...

options.response: You hand in the empty coke bottle and gain a coin!
You hand in the empty fanta bottle and gain a coin!
You hand in the empty 7up bottle and gain a coin!
You took a bell pepper from the shelve.
You put the bell pepper back in the shelve.
You took some spinach from the shelve.
You put the spinach back in the shelve.
You took some lettuce from the shelve.
You put the lettuce back in the shelve.
Is this really a fruit? You took it anyway.
You put the bell pepper back in the shelve.
This definitely came before the egg.
You put the chicken back in the shelve.
You put the bacon back in the shelve.
You put the minced meat back in the shelve.
You put the cheese back in the shelve.
You put the herb cheese back in the shelve.
You put the crème fraîche back in the shelve, sounds like a mistake to be honest.

chips-shelve1.name: Chips Shelve
chips-shelve1.description: A shelve filled with chips, nice.

options.response: You carefully take the nachos, don't wanna break these.
You put the nachos back in the shelve.

canned-shelve1.name: Canned foods Shelve
canned-shelve1.description: A shelve filled with canned foods.

options.response: You take a can of corn.
You put the corn back in the shelve.
You put the coke bottle back in the shelve.
You put the fanta bottle back in the shelve.
You put the 7up bottle back in the shelve.

packaged-shelve1.name: Packaged foods Shelve
packaged-shelve1.description: A shelve filled with packaged foods.

options.response: You put the wraps back in the shelve.
You put the pasta back in the shelve.

stockroom-sink.name: Stockroom sink
stockroom-sink.description: A sink, where no one can see you...

options.response: You sneakily empty the coke bottle.
You sneakily empty the fanta bottle.
You put the guacemole back in the shelve.

shopping-cart-coin-pickup.message: You check your pockets for coins. Your backpocket contains one! When trying to insert it into the cart you notice it already has a coin in it. Lucky! You decide to put the coin you found in your wallet

purse-coin-pickup.message: You check the contents of the purse, it contained a coin! You put the coin in your wallet.

pay-1.message: You are now out of coins!

mobile-phone-battery-dies.name: Mobile Phone Battery Died
mobile-phone-battery-dies.message: The battery of your mobile phone just ran out, guess that means no more calls from Patrick
